name: Shop Fox D2465 Aluminum Bar Clamp, 24"
short_description: 20-Inch Capacity
1-5/8-Inch Throat Depth
24-Inch bar length
product_description: Rigid torsion-box style bars allow these light aluminum bar clamps to maintain in-line clamping pressure without bending or twisting. Simple spring loaded detent action of the fixed jaw provides quick and secure adjustments and, since the sliding jaws wrap completely around the four-sided bar, there is no lifting or twisting of the jaw faces as pressure is applied. We think you'll agree, these are the best bar clamps around.

name: VEVOR Bar Clamps for Woodworking, 2-Pack 24 inch One-Handed Clamp/Spreader, Quick-Grip F-Clamp with 340 lbs Load Limit, Premium Plastic and Carbon Steel, for Woodworking Metal working, Blue + Black
short_description: High-quality Materials: The handle of our bar clamps is made of PA6+GF30% high-strength plastic, stronger and more durable than ABS. The slide bar is constructed from 45# carbon structural steel, ensuring long-lasting and crack-resistant performance

24-inch Large Jaw Opening: Our bar clamps for woodworking are ideal for various standard-sized woods. The 24-inch length provides users with more adjustment space during operation, resulting in precise positioning of the workpiece

340lbs Load Limit: These wood clamps for woodworking can easily handle various daily processing and assembly tasks, securely fixing to cut, join, and install wood, wood products (such as tables, chairs, cabinets), and steel materials
Simple and Easy to Use: With automatic lock and one-button unlock, our F clamps allow for single-handed operation throughout the process, making the processing efficient and time-saving

Clamping/Spreader Quick Converting: Our woodworking clamps can also be used as a spreader. You can quickly change the clamp to a spreader with the button. From precision clamping to solid reverse support, this versatile clamp has got you covered in any situation

name: MAXPOWER F Clamp 24 inch, Heavy Duty Clamps for Welding, Max Jaw 24-inch, Throat depth 4-3/4 inch, Pack of 2

Swivel pad for uneven surfaces, provide evenly clamping force and protect your workpieces
Quick adjust sliding arm, 30% Increased clamping pressure 550KG / 1200lbs
MAXPOWER Heavy duty F clamps set, recommend for professional welder

name: Heavy Duty 24" Inch F-Clamp w/Replaceable Pad, 5-1/2-Inch(140mm) Deep Throat, Drop Forged Steel F Style Bar Clamps for Welding, Bar Size 1-1/5" * 3/5", 2900LB Clamping Force
short_description: PREMIUM CONSTRUCTION: KARRYTON heavy duty F-clamp is meticulously crafted using drop forged 40 Cr alloy steel, ensuring exceptional strength and resilience. This construction technique enhances the clamp's durability, making it a reliable choice for even the most demanding woodworking and metalworking projects. Max jaw opening: 24"/600mm; Throat depth: 5 1/2"/140mm; Bar size 1-1/5"(30mm) x 3/5"(15mm); Clamping force: 2900LB(1300KG).

POWERFUL CLAMPING FORCE: The F-shaped design and its drop forged design provides a superior clamping force of 2900LB grip on various materials, guaranteeing stability during projects. The detachable and replaceable swivel pad can meet multiple work requirements, whether you're clamping wood, metal, or other materials, this clamp holds them firmly in place, allowing you to work with precision.

ADJUSTABLE JAW: The adjustable swivel jaw of KARRYTON F bar clamp allows you to adapt to various workpiece sizes and shapes. The precision-engineered screw mechanism enables easy and smooth adjustments, granting you the flexibility to tackle a wide range of projects.

QUICK-RELEASE HANDLE: Efficiency is key in any workshop, and our F-clamp features an ergonomic quick-release handle for swift and hassle-free setup. This mechanism saves you valuable time during clamping and unclamping, so you can focus on the task at hand.

WIDE APPLICATION: Whether you're a professional tradesperson or a DIY enthusiast, this drop forged F-clamp is designed to meet your needs. It's perfect for heavy-duty applications such as welding, woodworking, metal fabrication, and more, making it an indispensable tool in your workshop arsenal.

name: 24" Bar Clamps for Woodworking, 4-Piece One-Handed Clamp/Spreader, Light-Duty Quick-Change F Clamp with 170 lbs Load Limit
short_description: SOLID CONSTRUCTION: A great, defined, rail construction makes sure the clamps do not slip and tighten very effectively when really putting the pressure on. (rated up to 170lbs)

QUICK-CLAMP: The quick-release latch makes it so easy to take them off your project or adjusts the fix in seconds. Larger pads provide a larger area of thrust surface. More balanced force and parallel clamp.

BETTER USE EXPERIENCE: Non-marring removable and replaceable pads feature flexible material and non-slip texture, which enhances the overall clamping force. The ergonomically-designed handle and dipping plastic on the quick-release latch are both for customers' comfort.

CLAMP & SPREADER: The unique quick-change button design allows the f clamp to be a spreader as well. Just press the red button to take the jaw off and then reverse it before putting it back in, you will get the spreader you need.

BAR CLAMPS SET: The set contains 2 pieces of 24" bar clamps. The 24" clamp can be set to a spreader with sizes up to 30". A great, defined, rail construction makes sure the clamps do not slip and tighten very effectively when really putting the pressure on.

product_description: The IRWIN QUICK-GRIP One-Handed Mini Bar Clamp 6 Pack, Light-Duty, is the perfect clamp set for smaller projects and working in confined spaces. Reinforced resin bodies and hardened steel bars ensure strength and durability. These clamps feature non-marring pads to protect work surfaces, one-handed quick-release triggers and provide up to 140 lbs. of clamping force. Set includes two 4-1/2", two 6", and two 12" One-Handed Mini Bar Clamps.

name: HimaPro 24 Inch Bar Clamp Set, 2 Pack 600 lbs Load Limit Medium Duty Quick Release Steel F Clamp, Ideal for Woodworking, Metalworking, and DIY Projects
short_description: Versatile Clamp Set: Perfect for woodworking projects requiring a secure and permanent attachment with glue, adhesive, nails, or screws. Also ideal for metalworking, holding pieces together for welding or bolting.
Impressive Clamping Force: Each bar clamp in this set allows a maximum clamping force of up to 600 lbs, providing the strength needed for various demanding applications.

Sliding Bar Design: The sliding bar design enables the sliding head to be securely fixed at any point along the rail. This feature makes it easy to adjust the opening distance to fit your specific project requirements.
Durable Construction: The rail and spindle of each clamp are made of high-quality carbon steel, while the jaw is crafted from malleable iron, ensuring long-lasting performance and reliability.

Wide Range of Applications: Suitable for woodworking, carpentry, metalworking, welding, and general clamping tasks. This versatile clamp set is a valuable addition to any workshop, garage, or job site.

name: FEIRONG Heavy Duty 24" Bar Clamps 2-Pack - Professional Grade, Quick-Release, 330LB Load Limit, Built-in Ruler, 90° Angled Jaws for DIY Woodworking & Cabinet Installation | Fits 20.5" Work Range
short_description: FEIRONG Bar Clamp:The throat depth of this clamp is 1.5 inches(3.8 cm), and its maximum opening capacity is 20.5 inches(52.07 cm). Specifically designed for woodworking, this clamp is suitable for securing workpieces of various shapes and sizes, including square, round, rectangular, and more. It can be used for various applications such as panel splicing, box assembly, securing furniture components, and more, making it a trusty companion for woodworkers.

Strong Clamping Force：The maximum pressure allowed by the lever clamp reaches up to 150KG/330LBS. Featuring a threaded screw-in design, it allows for adjustable clamping ranges to meet the clamping needs of different workpieces. With strong clamping force, it can securely fix the workpiece and prevent it from loosening or shifting during the processing.

Self-Contained Graduations:The built-in graduations on the FEIRONG woodworking clamp can assist woodworkers in more precisely positioning and adjusting the wood during clamping, simplifying the workflow. It allows for more accurate control over the clamping force and range, meeting high requirements for processing precision. The woodworking clamp with built-in graduations is undoubtedly a worthwhile option to consider.

Premium Design:The ergonomic design makes operation easier and more comfortable, reducing hand fatigue. The sliding arm and rotating screw move smoothly without obstruction, improving work efficiency. It is made of high-strength carbon steel and aluminum to ensure the robustness and durability of the fixture

Applicable Scope: This product is widely applicable to a diverse range of light clamping projects, making it an ideal choice for amateurs pursuing DIY endeavors, skilled carpenters working on intricate woodworking projects, pole workers engaged in construction and maintenance tasks.
